channel.title: Dadmother - .:BR0N4M1 C0D3:
channel.description:
Do you find yourself reminiscing on the good old days of plugging in your Super Nintendo and firing up a classic like ‘Brawl Brothers’? Throwing that copy of ‘Streets of Rage 2’ into your Sega Genesis and annihilating your enemies? Running down to the arcade with a pocketful of quarters so you could dominate ‘Double Dragon’?
Of course you do.
I’m proud to present my most recent effort:
.:BR0N4M1 C0D3:. —> (Bronami Code)
This track was inspired by those classic beat-em-up, brawler video games from the late 80s and early 90s. I hope you all enjoy, and I am always open to all feedback and criticism. Thanks for listening! https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/br0n4m1-c0d3 ![image|500x500](upload://g3YqIjJEKsF5ZFybFPBgjX8LEOJ.jpeg)
